string.name: name
string.value: Jay's Curiosity

It's weird... When I walked passed #bJay from Henesys#k the other day, he didn't answer my greetings and didn't even notice me there. It looked like he was working on some kind of riddle by himself. Let's find out what Jay is up to these days.

I don't believe I actually offered to help him on finding a historical figure just out of curiosity! I guess it won't hurt to check out the dungeon as #p1012109# requested... But I really doubt I would find anything there. It's a legend, myth, a fairy tale.
I found Bob from #m105090300# and talked with bunch of people about him. He is famous around this world.
Oh hi! I'm sorry. I didn't see you standing there. I was just catching up my reading on the Maple History books that you've returned.\n\n#L0##bI thought you've read them all.#k#l

Yes I did. Since my dad is the Chief of Henesys, he was very strict on memorizing every single events that has occured in Maple History. I still remember all the names and numbers.\n\n#L0##bThen why are you reading it? And why do you look so troubled?#k#l

Something in this book has been bothering me. The name #bBob Snale#k is written all over this book but there is no picture, not really much of a description of this person, just magically appears and then disappears without explanation. If I only knew...

#L0##bSounds like something I can help you with.#l
#L1##bGood luck! (nerd...)#k#l
Really? You would really do that for me?
Thanks for visiting by~

That'd be very helpful! I've been to everywhere around Victoria Island looking for Bob Snale's traces that was written in the Maple History Books. I talked with numerous people but no one seemed to know this #bperson#k at all!

So far I've got from this book was that he was last seen deep inside the dungeon. I'd go there myself but it's too dangerous for me. Would you check out what's around there for me? Thank you very much.
Thanks for visiting by~
Welcome back! I've been waiting very long for you. How did the search for Bob go?\r\n\r\n#L0##bI brought him with me.#k#l
What? What do you mean? Where's the legendary Bob?\r\n\r\n#L0##bHe's a snail. Actually, this specific snail... (Shows him Bob's Snail Shell)#k#l

I see... You are joking now, aren't you? You could have just told me that you didn't want to help in the first place, you know...\r\n\r\n#L0##bThat's not it! This is the exact reason I couldn't tell you when I first found out this snail is Bob. It was hard for me to believe so I had meet bunch of people to prove that this is Bob Snale himself!#k#l

Oh really? So you are seriously telling me this is Bob... Wait a second... Yes! He IS Bob! Maple History Books never stated that Bob was a person. I just never would have guessed he was actually Snail, a green snail.\r\n\r\n#L0##bYes, now we are talking.#k#l
But how come he's in his snail shell and not coming out?\r\n\r\n#L0##bOh, that. I kind of had to scare him to death to bring him here...#k#l

What? How dangerous! This snail might seem like just another ordinary snail but he is the actual being that has been with us since the beginning of MapleStory!\r\n\r\n#L0##bAlright, calm down, calm down. At least, he's here.#k#l
I think you owe him an apology. You should tell him you're sorry.\r\n\r\n#L0##bI wish I could but he's not coming out from his shell. At least not when I am around...#k#l

I think it's because he is still frightened and scared that you might try to kill him. Hmm... I might be able to help you with that. I've seen a place around here that looked just like Snail Hunting Ground I of Maple Island. He's known to be born from that place and he might feel safer to come out if he's there.
Thanks for finding Bob and taking care of him! I will now take him to a place where he can get the rest he deserves!
Thanks for visiting by~
Thanks for visiting by~
Thanks for visiting by~
Oh hi! Welcome back! Any news? ...? No?\nSigh...\nAlright. Just keep me updated if anything happens.

Oh hi! Welcome back! Ok, about Bob Snale, I finally received some great news. So far I've sent letters to #bBruce, Gwin, Grendel The Really Old, The Rememberer#k and they told me that they have seen Bob back in the days when he was alive! Some of them also said that he might still be out there wandering too. Would you please be kind enough to check with them? My hands are tied since I am sending more and more letters out in search for the trace of Mr. Snale!
